full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 335 of 348 By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them. R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY Dated: By: Dated: 9/24/07 By: A. ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN Page 7 of 7 DOJ-OGR-00003511
